Create Dimension Specs

Source: R/create_dims.R
create_dims.Rd

Create Dimension Specs

create_dims(n, d)

Arguments

n

The total number of values

d

The number of dimensions

Value

A d-column row-ordered matrix of possible dimensions or (invisibly) a message if no dimensions can be found.

Examples

k <- create_dims(n = 20, d = 3)
# Create an array with dimensions sampled from `k`:
array(sample(x = 20, size = prod(k[1, ]), replace = TRUE), dim = k[sample(nrow(k), 1), ])
#> , , 1
#> 
#>      [,1]
#> [1,]   12
#> [2,]   12
#> [3,]   14
#> [4,]    7
#> 
#> , , 2
#> 
#>      [,1]
#> [1,]    1
#> [2,]   15
#> [3,]    5
#> [4,]   19
#> 
#> , , 3
#> 
#>      [,1]
#> [1,]    1
#> [2,]   12
#> [3,]   15
#> [4,]   14
#> 
#> , , 4
#> 
#>      [,1]
#> [1,]   14
#> [2,]    4
#> [3,]    1
#> [4,]    7
#> 
#> , , 5
#> 
#>      [,1]
#> [1,]    9
#> [2,]    3
#> [3,]    7
#> [4,]   20
#> 

k <- create_dims(n = 56, d = 4)
# Create an array with dimensions sampled from `k`:
array(sample(x = 20, size = prod(k[1, ]), replace = TRUE), dim = k[sample(nrow(k), 1), ])
#> , , 1, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]    2    9    1   13
#> 
#> , , 2, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   13   10   15    7
#> 
#> , , 3, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   12    3    9    6
#> 
#> , , 4, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]    5    7   19   18
#> 
#> , , 5, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]    8   10    3   11
#> 
#> , , 6, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   19   11    1   17
#> 
#> , , 7, 1
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]    6   14    1    6
#> 
#> , , 1, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   18   13   12    8
#> 
#> , , 2, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]    6   15    6    6
#> 
#> , , 3, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   18   10    3   19
#> 
#> , , 4, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]    1    3   17    6
#> 
#> , , 5, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   10    7   15   18
#> 
#> , , 6, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   17   13   17   15
#> 
#> , , 7, 2
#> 
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4]
#> [1,]   15   12    8    7
#>
